ddec59da-dd9e-4891-ac45-6e6e7f6fe9cb.description: The earner of this badge has completed 12 hours of coursework that includes 4 workshops on developing R scripts to manage and format data frames to required criteria that include: "tidy" , joining, "regex" string functions, grouping, mutating and ggplot visualization to validate results. A group project was developed and presented.
ddec59da-dd9e-4891-ac45-6e6e7f6fe9cb.name: Data Wrangling

issuer.summary: issued by Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

entity.name: Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

badge_template_activities.title: Earner participated in four workshops to format data into a tidy data frame using diplyr and tidyr functions such as: join, group, mutate, "regex" string functions and ggplot visualization to validate results.

A group project was assigned to develop visualizations and wrangling of large datasets that would compare COVID-19 excess-deaths of multiple US states and territories in a meaningful way. A research questions was defined to answer with data.

Statistical tools and visualizations should be used in a 15 minute group presentation with 5 minutes of questions by expert speakers and other participants . The presentation included discussion of results, analysis and future work.

94b262cf-ee8c-4bba-9fde-2cbfeb263785.description: Earners of this badge have participated in 12 hours of workshop during the 2022 DS-INTER Summer Institute. Have validated their work through homeworks that may include KNIME and group research and presentation.
94b262cf-ee8c-4bba-9fde-2cbfeb263785.name: Real World Problems in Data Science

issuer.summary: issued by Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

entity.name: Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

badge_template_activities.title: Homework included KNIME programming in order to build a complex model including: Risk Management, Operation Analysis, Decision Frames and Institutional Roadmaps.
Earner has participated in a group project, analyzed a problem, designed and presented the group project at the 2022 DS-INTER Summer Institute.

6bb4b6c5-5552-4d9e-9cfe-499c5620b9a0.description: Earner attended 12 hours of Machine Learning part 2 workshop from the DS-INTER Summer Institute. The workshops and courses included the theoretical and mathematical study of support vector machine and neural networks. The Singular Value Decomposition for dimensionality reduction is also explained. Codes in MATLAB and Python are developed and a final group project and presentation on classification of handwritten digits is studied using ML algorithms and visualizations of handwritten digits.
6bb4b6c5-5552-4d9e-9cfe-499c5620b9a0.name: Machine Learning 2

issuer.summary: issued by Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

entity.name: Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

badge_template_activities.title: From one to four MATLAB and/or Python coding homework for SVM codes with quadratic optimization, and neural networks. Two optional theoretical questions on VC number and updating weights for NN with back-propagation and gradient descent.
Classify handwritten digits using either SVM or NN, and analyze accuracy and results for testing data of the chosen algorithm. Include dimensionality reduction.
Earners are required to design and prepare a group presentation of their Machine Learning project. Discussion and analysis of the most significant findings is required.

0b56b034-04b0-4d68-b14a-deca034d2dde.description: The earner of this badge has completed 12 hours of coursework that include 4 workshops on sample statistics with R scripts, hypothesis testing, interval estimation and uncertainty, modeling with linear and multiple regression and access to large databases of anonymous higher education student variables.
0b56b034-04b0-4d68-b14a-deca034d2dde.name: Inference and Modeling for Data Science

issuer.summary: issued by Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

entity.name: Data Science at Inter American University of Puerto Rico

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed validated homework that include modification of R script to test hypothesis, confidence interval, or develop regression model.
Earner participated in group project, analyze the problem, design and develop the project presentation with analysis, and optional participation in the research project presentation.
